description:
These merino wool running socks seamlessly blend style with functionality, offering breathability and marathon-level durability that refuses to give up, even when you're in it for the long haul. Behind this sock's adaptability and advanced technology lies your secret weapon for outperforming your training partners. But let's keep it down-low. We wouldn't want them to catch up.

  • Made of merino wool, nylon and spandex
  • Performance fit ensures zero slipping, no bunching, and zero blisters. Cheers to concentrating on your run, not your feet
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Element Micro Crew Run Socks - Unisex
